text: Gather all needed ingredients.  Tear the bread into small pieces. You could toast the bread and break it up after it cools if you prefer. Preheat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Spray a shallow baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Add all the ingredients to a mixing bowl.  Combine all the ingredients thoroughly. You can use your clean hands to mix up the meat loaf or use a heavy-duty stand mixer such as a Kitchen Aid to do this. Shape into a loaf and place in the prepared baking pan.  Spread ketchup over the top of the loaf.  Bake approximately one hour. Use a clean meat thermometer to ensure it's baked properly. Remove from bread pan. Slice like bread to serve. Enjoy!
